questions.question_text: How does Tilloo manage to find his way to the ‘forbidden passage’?
hints: Look for Tilloo's actions with his father's security card
Recall how he evades his mother

questions.question_text: What did Tilloo hope to see once he emerged from his underground home?
hints: Think about what Tilloo has heard about but never seen
Consider his expectations from the surface

questions.question_text: Why did Tilloo’s father advise him not to try to reach the surface of the planet?
hints: Recall the surface conditions described by Tilloo's father

questions.question_text: What changes had occurred, which forced people to live in underground homes?
Why was everyone in the Control Room greatly excited?
hints: Recall what appears on the TV screen
Consider the significance of the moving dot

questions.question_text: Was the spacecraft manned or unmanned? How do you know it?
hints: Look for Number One's report about the spacecraft contents

questions.question_text: What did Number One and Number Two suggest should be done about the alien spacecraft?
What do you think the mechanical hand was trying to do?
hints: Connect to the NASA Viking Mission context

questions.question_text: Tilloo pressed the red button and 'the damage was done'. What was the damage?
hints: Look at what happens immediately after button press

questions.question_text: Where had the spacecraft come from?
hints: Recall the President's report about spacecraft origin

questions.question_text: On which planet do Tilloo and his parents live?
hints: Connect story context to real-world space missions

questions.question_text: If you had to live in a home like Tilloo's, what parts of life would you find most difficult? What compensations might there be?
hints: Consider lack of natural sunlight and open spaces

questions.question_text: What, if anything, might drive mankind to make their homes underground?
Do you think there is life on other planets? Can you guess what kind of people there may be on them? In what ways are they likely to be different from us?
